net.rim.device.api.system
Interface HolsterListener

Deprecated. See Sensor.HOLSTER 

public interface HolsterListener

The listener interface for receiving holster and flip events. This class is deprecated, please use SensorListener.

See Also:
Application.addHolsterListener(net.rim.device.api.system.HolsterListener), SensorListener

Method Summary
 void inHolster()
          Deprecated. For BlackBerry flip smartphones, invoked when you close the flip for the device.
 void outOfHolster()
          Deprecated. For BlackBerry flip smartphones, invoked when you open the flip for the device.
 



Method Detail

inHolster

void inHolster()
Deprecated. 
For BlackBerry flip smartphones, invoked when you close the flip for the device. For BlackBerry non-flip smartphones, invoked when you place the device in the holster.

outOfHolster

void outOfHolster()
Deprecated. 
For BlackBerry flip smartphones, invoked when you open the flip for the device. For BlackBerry non-flip smartphones, invoked when you remove the device from the holster.
